resources.string:
This application sends multitouch events via TUIO/UDP. You can change the target IP address and port number as well as the default screen orientation in the settings dialog. The TUIO verbosity can be increased for the use on unreliable networks. You will find further information about the TUIO protocol and framework at http://www.tuio.org

A possible "Client does not respond" error message indicates that there is no response from the client. In some cases this is related to the firewall settings on your client device, and will work properly in spite of the warning.

The included Java TUIO implementation is based on the JavaOSC library by Chandrasekhar Ramakrishnan.
